title: League is acting up
body: Well when I'm in a game if i open ANYTHING (shop, chat, options) it always brings up these lines anyone have any ideas on how to fix this or what went wrong any info helps

replies.body:
Hey Brendanr, 


This generally happens when you have out of date or corrupted graphics drivers. Do you know what graphics card you are using currently? If you do, you can perform a clean install and it should resolve this issue. Here are the steps!

First download the drivers pertinent to your graphics card. Do not run the program just yet.

- [Click this for AMD Graphics cards.](http://support.amd.com/us/gpudownload/Pages/index.aspx )

- [Click this for Nvidia graphics cards.](http://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx?lang=en-us)

- [Click this for Intel graphic cards.](https://downloadcenter.intel.com/default.aspx)

Then perform these steps.

1) Click Start (Windows Key + Q in Windows 8).
2) Click Control Panel. If there is an option to Switch to Classic View, do so.
3) Click System.
4) Click the Hardware tab, then click Device Manager.
5) Click the "Display Adapter" tab and click the drop down arrow. You should see your device.
6) Right click your video card and select properties.
7) Under the Drivers tab, select uninstall and restart your computer.
8) Run through the driver installation.

Let me know if this works for you!
